summary: CAR WAS PARKED IN MY DRIVEWAY.  TRIED TO START VEHICLE, BATTERY FAILED AND UNABLE TO RECHARGE.  REMOVED FAILED BATTERY REPLACED WITH NEW BATTERY, STARTED CAR AND WRENCH AND ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON.  UNABLE TO ACCELERATE VEHICLE, DRIVES 5 MILES PER HOUR.  ONLINE CHATS SPEAK OF FAILED THROTTLE BODY,  ONE POST STATES THERE IS A RECALL BUT I DO NOT FIND IN ON THE NHTSA WEBSITE.  DID FIND THE AIRBAG RECALL WITH NO SOLUTION YET.  PLEASE ADVISE.
